author: pmcl77
title: NFT Floor-Update
description: NFT collectors spend hours everyday on multiple marketplaces checking the (floor) value of NFTs they own or they want to trade/sell/buy.
solution: We will provide daily floor updates and immediate price change alerts from multiple marketplaces - based on your criteria all at one glance!
experience: 15 years of experience in developing data based reporting solutions and applications. Experience in researching, collecting and trading NFTs
